title: [MEDIUM] Hardcoded strings not localized
description:
File: moe-jetbrains/src/main/kotlin/com/moe/* (multiple files)

Issue: 10+ locations with hardcoded English strings.

Fix: Extract to resource bundle for i18n.

implementationPlan.description: Replace hardcoded strings with bundle lookups

reopenReason: Bundle created but not applied. Only 5 usages of MoeBundle.message() vs 89 keys defined. Hardcoded strings remain: Create Task/Epic dialogs, Save/Delete/Approve/Reject buttons, column titles (Backlog, Planning, etc). Need to replace ALL hardcoded strings with MoeBundle.message() calls.
